attributes.action: Theresa May is unfit to remain in her job as Home Secretary
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is to demand the removal of Theresa May from her position in HM Gov't as Home Secretary.

Following the civil disobedience in London and other cities in England, her weak will and refusal to tackle the issue head-on, with decisive action, shows her to be ineffective and out of touch with public opinion, and failing completely in the protection of the citizens of the affected areas of the country.
